p: Such well-being and inclusiveness promotion must be at all levels, proper understanding must be sought at all levels to understand which lever could be moved to achieve greater benefits for the largest number of people. Would unemployment insurance help promote resilience? How do we improve educational systems to enhance social mobility? What will ensure that the disabled, minorities, females and others are included in the economic and social development of the country? What sort of data do we need to collect to ensure adequate preparedness and robust response? Various approaches would have to be explored as there is no one-size-fits-all.
